title.rendered: How to Hire a Virtual Assistant with Ana Santiago from Outsource School

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:47 — 31.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:47 — 31.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Ana Santiago is the COO of Outsource School, she has been working remotely for over 10 years and now manages a team of over 15 VAs. Outsource School is there to give entrepreneurs the best and fastest hiring system.

 

1. Special Community Discount for 20% off our yearly plan:
Code: Outsource20
Checkout Page: Outsource School Insider Checkout

Schedule a call with Ana for an in-depth explanation of how we can help and what our services are + additional bonuses to the discount: Chat with Ana from Outsource School2. VA Budget Calculator: Download the Free VA Calculator to Understand Your Hiring Budget (outsourceschool.com)

3. 5 Keys to Scaling Any Digital Business with Virtual Assistants – Three Crazy Simple Tactics to Hiring a VA (outsourceschool.com)

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to avoid getting the wrong person when hiring
  • What the C.A.R.E acronym stands for
  • How to interview your Virtual Assistant
  • When to choose a specialist and a generalist
  • How to transition out doing everything
  • What you need to have in place to become hands off
